title: why everytime you get a little winstreak in ranked...
body:
you suddenly hit by a wave of toxic teammates, people who tilt and flame after dying once, trolls, people rage quitting or afks in general, and  games that are literally decided in the first 5 minutes and enemies that are just flat out 20x better than you but are still in your elo for some reason?
can someone explain this system to me? why is the system built this way??
